programme.title: Achoura
Aszura
Achoura
programme.desc:
Achoura: Directed by Talal Selhami. With Sofiia Manousha, Younes Bouab, Omar Lotfi, Iván González. Four childhood friends are reunited when one of them surfaces after twenty years, forcing them to confront a creature straight out of a spine-chilling Moroccan legend." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt4188180/","name":"Achoura","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BY2QyOGFhZmYtZjY1NC00MmYxLTkyZTEtZjAzMGJhMGFmOTIyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzEyMDU1MzU@._V1_.jpg","description":"Four childhood friends are reunited when one of them surfaces after twenty years, forcing them to confront a creature straight out of a spine-chilling Moroccan legend.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt4188180/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"xara-59700"},"dateCreated":"2019-10-18","inLanguage":"English","name":"6 for amateur effort","reviewBody":"First horror movie by this guy, perhaps first Maroccan horror movie ever to make it internationally. This alone and the base for the film scores all the way up to 6. (A for the spine to see this project though! ) This film, however, has a really great idea and lots of faults that have not been thought through- both in the story as well as in the timeline and the quality and feel. It feels like the director somehow didn't really trust his idea and so had to drag in random momentums from previous horror films. The movie could be mistaken for a poor filmatisation of a Stephen King novel. The base of the story is SO good it can stand on its own feet- it does NOT need copied scenes from Hollywood movies.

The music is an ambitious high-end orchestral sound track that sadly is composed by someone who doesn't really know anything about classical music and instead copies straight from American classics. My guess is the team that composed the music has no one who's gone through music school and are "self-taught" so to speak... I could be wrong, of course, but the music is not advanced (actually a bit flat and childish) and not original- however, the string section HAS to be original studio recordings- which is great! And played by professional orchestral musicians- THAT is something you can't miss. The fact that the foley is a bit obvious and out of place along with the music being too intense and overpowering leaves very little to the imagination, and sadly steals a lot of the intended creepiness of the movie. (Rule number ONE in horror- the sound is (usually) 80% of the movie!!!)

The child actors are not that great- but better than 90% of Hollywood (which is not much of an achievement). The trowel between the bricks is non existing and so the story, which has many great bricks (points, finesses)- falls apart. The finesses in the story leads to nowhere or are not properly focused on. It's like trying to juggle with 10 balls and catching only 5. Some stereotypical characteristics in characters occur, but that can of course be expected.

I would love this movie to be "re-cut" and with a new soundtrack (I mean, keep the original, just don't shove it in every intense scene) and make more sense in the story (have someone else read it and screen it for people first to get feedback)- and then have someone properly grade it (no "auto-detect" gradient, which at the moment feels like the case). Then the movie would be so much more!

Oh- and Achoura is NOT only a Maroccan celebration. It's an Islamic celebration (which stretches beyond Marocco, for the ones that didn't know). If you write: Ashura in Google- you will find it.

Enjoy the movie! It's worth a watch as, like I wrote, it still is the first horror movie by this guy. (Imagine all the potential)","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":264,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5},"genre":["Fantasy","Horror","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2020-02-21","keywords":"creature","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer [English SUB]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4284071705","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODVjNmY1ZjQtNmQxMS00YTY4LWJhZTctZTQ0NTM1MTYwYWY0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODVjNmY1ZjQtNmQxMS00YTY4LWJhZTctZTQ0NTM1MTYwYWY0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3809653/","name":"Sofiia Manousha"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4443538/","name":"Younes Bouab"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3254180/","name":"Omar Lotfi"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2317858/","name":"Talal Selhami"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0684460/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0562074/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0410559/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6918485/","name":"Jawad Lahlou"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2317858/","name":"Talal Selhami"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4750158/","name":"David Villemin"}],"duration":"PT1H30M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Mrs Lowry & Son

Nocturnal Animals
programme.desc:
Nocturnal Animals: Directed by Tom Ford. With Amy Adams, Jake Gyllenhaal, Michael Shannon, Aaron Taylor-Johnson. A wealthy art gallery owner is haunted by her ex-husband's novel, a violent thriller she interprets as a symbolic revenge tale." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt4550098/","name":"Nocturnal Animals","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTYwMzMwMzgxNl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTA0MTUzMDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A wealthy art gallery owner is haunted by her ex-husband's novel, a violent thriller she interprets as a symbolic revenge tale.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt4550098/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"slimecity-38663"},"dateCreated":"2020-04-13","inLanguage":"English","name":"Thats great acting Gary!","reviewBody":"On a bit of a Jake binge, that led me here. You also cant go wrong with Amy Adams. Plus Jenna Malone if you are a fan of the amazing Neon Demon.

The story revolves around a novel containing a fairly OTT crime, but one that leaves room for visually compelling scene-setups. I like how the novel unfolds over several years, and ties in with the regrets over the decisions that the Amy Adams character made over her life. The analogies between her loveless, vacuous and empty life and the novel are pretty apparent.

This is a very compelling film with a very haunting ending. Well worth a watch. Its pretty tough viewing at times though","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":256400,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2016-12-09","keywords":"revenge,loss of wife,art gallery,female frontal nudity,based on novel","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Teaser Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2326443545","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTYzNzExODM2MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNzQ3MDMwMDI@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTYzNzExODM2MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNzQ3MDMwMDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"An art gallery owner is haunted by her ex-husband's novel, a violent thriller she interprets as a veiled threat and a symbolic revenge tale."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0010736/","name":"Amy Adams"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0350453/","name":"Jake Gyllenhaal"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0788335/","name":"Michael Shannon"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1053530/","name":"Tom Ford"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0042399/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0251339/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0193161/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1053530/","name":"Tom Ford"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm7216022/","name":"Austin Wright"}],"duration":"PT1H56M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Die Goldfische
Kłamstwo doskonałe
The Good Liar
programme.desc: Die Goldfische: Directed by Alireza Golafshan. With Tom Schilling, Klaas Heufer-Umlauf, Lisa Bitter, Sabrina Dietel. A good natured comedy about tax evasion and disability." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt7689310/","name":"Die Goldfische","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTg2YTMyYjMtMTQ3Mi00OTU4LTlmMDEtYzQ2YjVjNWYxZDA1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMDU5MDEyMA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A good natured comedy about tax evasion and disability.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7689310/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"kosmasp"},"dateCreated":"2021-05-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"Pricey fish","reviewBody":"Certain things may be hard for us as viewers to connect to. Not being a banker or someone who is detached from human interaction in general, it is not easy to fully identify with the main character here. And there are flaws or at least weird decisions along the way ... but it is a comedy and it tries to be as funny as it can be overall.\n\nThat out of the way, I had no idea what the movie would be like or any story element, so color me shocked and surprised by the inciting incident at the start of the movie. I did not see that coming/happening. After that "bang" the movie takes a minute to breathe a little bit and that is the moment you see the human in our main character. Overall we get quite a few of cliches though, but still it does its best to stay on the right side of funny and delicate when it touches certain subjects. Funny but predictable - still entertaining if you let it.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1680,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6},"genre":["Comedy"],"datePublished":"2019-03-21","keywords":"disability,wilhelm scream","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Die Goldfische","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3829447705","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDZiZjViMDctZWE0Mi00NDdlLThjYzQtN2Q3YWQ0NjEyMmE0XkEyXkFqcGdeQTNwaW5nZXN0._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDZiZjViMDctZWE0Mi00NDdlLThjYzQtN2Q3YWQ0NjEyMmE0XkEyXkFqcGdeQTNwaW5nZXN0._V1_.jpg","description":"Official Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0771713/","name":"Tom Schilling"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1678891/","name":"Klaas Heufer-Umlauf"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3474804/","name":"Lisa Bitter"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2285783/","name":"Alireza Golafshan"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0027692/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0239725/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008261/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2285783/","name":"Alireza Golafshan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1487045/","name":"Justyna Müsch"}],"duration":"PT1H51M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Far from the Madding Crowd
Z dala od zgiełku
Far from the Madding Crowd
programme.desc:
Far from the Madding Crowd: Directed by Thomas Vinterberg. With Carey Mulligan, Matthias Schoenaerts, Tilly Vosburgh, Mark Wingett. In Victorian England, the independent and headstrong Bathsheba Everdene attracts three very different suitors: Gabriel Oak, a sheep farmer; Frank Troy, a reckless Sergeant; and William Boldwood, a prosperous and mature bachelor." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2935476/","name":"Far from the Madding Crowd","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzI4NzUwNDgwN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTI3MjMwNTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"In Victorian England, the independent and headstrong Bathsheba Everdene attracts three very different suitors: Gabriel Oak, a sheep farmer; Frank Troy, a reckless Sergeant; and William Boldwood, a prosperous and mature bachelor.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2935476/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"KateC49"},"dateCreated":"2015-07-01","inLanguage":"English","name":"Exquisitley filmed but lacks the energy of the first (1967) film","reviewBody":"This has always been one of my favourite books & films and I was keen to see what they did with this a second time around. But what I want to say after seeing it was 1/see the first film 2/read the book. One of the most essential points to film was left out altogether in that when Bathsheba sent her 'joke' valentine to Boldwood she wrote the words 'Marry Me' on it. It wasn't the roses-are-red etc that got Boldwood in a twist it was the two words she wrote on the card. We get no sense of the quandary and deliberating over this that went on within Boldwood for some time before he made his move (and his ultimate obsession) in this film as we do in the first.

I think the scene when Fanny got the wrong church was disappointing as well. There was no sense of the mad dash she had across town to find the right church and only to find Frank striding out full of indignation at being stood up and telling her "It's too late!" The beautiful words of Gabriel to Bathsheba "when I look up there ye will be and when you look up there I will be" just don't feature at all.

The "shooting at the end was tame to say the least & Martin Sheen was much less forceful in his insistence of marrying Bathsheba But I did like Carey Mulligan as Bathdheba. What was missing was the energy & drama the original film had and dare I say it some Wessex accents....","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":47755,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.1},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2015-05-01","keywords":"farm,sheep,three men in love with the same woman,based on novel,playing","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2575019545","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjIyNTMzMjA4NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNzMyNzE1NDE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjIyNTMzMjA4NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNzMyNzE1NDE@._V1_.jpg","description":"In Victorian England, the independent and headstrong Bathsheba Everdene attracts three very different suitors: Gabriel Oak, a sheep farmer; Frank Troy, a reckless Sergeant; and William Boldwood, a prosperous and mature bachelor.
"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1659547/","name":"Carey Mulligan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0774386/","name":"Matthias Schoenaerts"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0790688/","name":"Michael Sheen"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0899121/","name":"Thomas Vinterberg"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0028932/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0103694/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0420822/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0362762/","name":"Thomas Hardy"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0390141/","name":"David Nicholls"}],"duration":"PT1H59M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: All Square
Jesteśmy kwita
All Square
programme.desc: All Square: Directed by John Hyams. With Michael Kelly, Jesse Ray Sheps, Pamela Adlon, Isiah Whitlock Jr.. A down-on-his-luck bookie befriends an ex-girlfriend's son and begins taking bets on his youth league baseball games, creating chaos in the community." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt6927880/","name":"All Square","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTdjY2Q3NjYtMzc3Mi00ZTJkLTkzZTUtYzgxNDJiZjliNDg5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjQ2NDU3NDY@._V1_.jpg","description":"A down-on-his-luck bookie befriends an ex-girlfriend's son and begins taking bets on his youth league baseball games, creating chaos in the community.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6927880/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"akcenat"},"dateCreated":"2018-12-26","inLanguage":"English","name":"Dont be fooled with trailer, it's a drama not comedy, with rare funny parts","reviewBody":"John (Michael Kelly) is a bookie whose black-market business is being severely undercut by online gambling and the unwillingness of his clients to pay him the money they owe. So he is deciding to bet on local Little League games.\n\n"All Square" hits too many familiar beats to be memorable, also it remains low to the ground for the most part not to mention that it doesn't succeed on the humor front - probably because of the director John Hyams, who is an odd choice for this film 'cos of his previous involvement in the action genre ("Dragon Eyes", "Universal Soldier: Day of Reckoning"). With a larger budget, "All Square" could have been more of a cinematic thriller with twists and turns at every corner. Instead, it's a smaller-focused feature film that serves as a character drama study. Basically, while "All Square" is not an entirely enjoyable ride, it's all a bit too thin. 6+/7-","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":440,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.1},"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-10-12","keywords":"bookie,baseball,little league,betting,sports betting","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"All Square","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2663037465","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDI5ZDA1MzYtZjRjMi00YjViLTk0YjgtOTU3NzY5MmJkOTI2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRoaXJkLXBhcnR5LXZpZGVvLXVwZGF0ZXI@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDI5ZDA1MzYtZjRjMi00YjViLTk0YjgtOTU3NzY5MmJkOTI2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRoaXJkLXBhcnR5LXZpZGVvLXVwZGF0ZXI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Official Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0446672/","name":"Michael Kelly"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6043297/","name":"Jesse Ray Sheps"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0781899/","name":"Pamela Adlon"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0404882/","name":"John Hyams"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0643102/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0667441/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm9004197/","name":"Timothy Brady"}],"duration":"PT1H33M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Days of Heaven
Niebiańskie dni
Days of Heaven
programme.desc: Days of Heaven: Directed by Terrence Malick. With Richard Gere, Brooke Adams, Sam Shepard, Linda Manz. A hot-tempered farm laborer convinces the woman he loves to marry their rich but dying boss so that they can have a claim to his fortune." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0077405/","name":"Days of Heaven","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjMyZmU4OGYtNjBiYS00YTIxLWJjMDUtZjczZmQwMTM4YjQxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTI4MjkwNjA@._V1_.jpg","description":"A hot-tempered farm laborer convinces the woman he loves to marry their rich but dying boss so that they can have a claim to his fortune.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0077405/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"katsat"},"dateCreated":"2002-03-27","inLanguage":"English","name":"One of the most haunting and beautiful films ever made","reviewBody":"If any movie could be called filmed poetry, this would be it. From its first opening shot to its last frame, there is such lyricism and emotion and beauty that it almost leaves you speechless. I have not seen this movie in years, but it still affects me and I want to write about it. There is a pervading sadness to the movie, like a memory of something wonderful that could have been, that should have been, that almost was, and is all the more tragic because it was in your hands but slipped through your fingers. This is not a movie for everyone, but if you believe that film can be one of the highest forms of art, this is the film to see.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":55962,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"1978-10-06","keywords":"farm,train,wealth,farm worker,seasonal work","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi320650777","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzJiMmI5OWYtMzFiNC00NjYyLWJhNzctOWViM2VmOTM2YWE4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzJiMmI5OWYtMzFiNC00NjYyLWJhNzctOWViM2VmOTM2YWE4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000152/","name":"Richard Gere"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000724/","name":"Brooke Adams"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001731/","name":"Sam Shepard"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000517/","name":"Terrence Malick"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0023400/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000517/","name":"Terrence Malick"}],"duration":"PT1H34M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Chances Are
Wszystko jest możliwe
Chances Are
programme.desc:
Chances Are: Directed by Emile Ardolino. With Cybill Shepherd, Robert Downey Jr., Ryan O'Neal, Mary Stuart Masterson. A reincarnated man unknowingly falls in love with his own daughter from his previous life. Once he realizes this, he tries to end their relationship before angels erase his memory." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0097044/","name":"Chances Are","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTA2MDEzNDQxOTZeQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU4MDYxMDIxMjAx._V1_.jpg","description":"A reincarnated man unknowingly falls in love with his own daughter from his previous life. Once he realizes this, he tries to end their relationship before angels erase his memory.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0097044/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"preppy-3"},"dateCreated":"2001-11-19","inLanguage":"English","name":"Sweet, romantic and funny","reviewBody":"A charming romantic comedy. The plot is a little too complicated--I tried to summarize it three times and I can't. Suffice to say it's worth seeing. The movie is funny, beautiful--the plot is totally unrealistic but it works. Everybody in the movie is so nice and everything looks so great--it creates a sweet, romantic feel through the entire film. 

The acting is great--Robert Downey Jr. and Cybill Shepherd are in top form and enjoying every second of it. Ryan O'Neal and Mary Stuart Masterson are just OK but fine. If you're a sucker for good, sweet sentimental films (like me), catch this one. Also Downey looks great in his underwear!

Extra bonuses--the title song sung by Johnny Mathis and another great song "After All" sung by Cher and Peter Cetera.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":12551,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Comedy","Fantasy","Romance"],"datePublished":"1989-03-10","keywords":"older woman younger man relationship,afterlife,reincarnation,love,death","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Chances Are","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1790771481","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BY2IxOWI2ZTEtMmEwYi00YTkxLWE5ZTktMzhlZmEwMzA5YWJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BY2IxOWI2ZTEtMmEwYi00YTkxLWE5ZTktMzhlZmEwMzA5YWJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Sony Pictures Home Entertainment"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001732/","name":"Cybill Shepherd"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000375/","name":"Robert Downey Jr."},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0641939/","name":"Ryan O'Neal"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001915/","name":"Emile Ardolino"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005883/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0043871/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0398286/","name":"Perry Howze"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0398287/","name":"Randy Howze"}],"duration":"PT1H48M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Nackte Tiere
Nagie zwierzęta
Nackte Tiere
programme.desc: Nackte Tiere: Directed by Melanie Waelde. With Katrin Beckmann, Michelangelo Fortuzzi, Ulrike Hübschmann, Luna Arwen Krüger. Five young people in provincial Germany. They run into each other and away from each other. They kiss and they fight. It's their last winter together before they leave school, after that it's stay or go. A feature film debut of enormous intensity." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt11162826/","name":"Nackte Tiere","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDYzZTU3MWItZmI1ZC00ZjljLTkzMDEtMjk1YTgyNjMwZjNhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTk0NzAwOTI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Five young people in provincial Germany. A feature film debut of enorm","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt11162826/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"kosmasp"},"dateCreated":"2021-03-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"What to make of ...","reviewBody":"Life or this movie. Or of anything - of violence, of love, of relationships, of music? There are certain things here that develop and there is a connection between the characters. And it all feels like real life. Which either excites you or annoys you while watching it.\n\nHaving someone choke another character out, to be surprised when they stop reacting ... but there is context to everything of course. Doing courses in fighting to fight through life itself and have a certain motivation but also a certain degree of strength. If you like slow cooking drama, this may be for you ... otherwise stay away from it, as far as possible.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":185,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.9},"genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2020-09-17","keywords":"f rated,boy girl kiss,boy boy kiss","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm11086001/","name":"Katrin Beckmann"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4925871/","name":"Michelangelo Fortuzzi"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0406139/","name":"Ulrike Hübschmann"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3726191/","name":"Melanie Waelde"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0584417/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3726191/","name":"Melanie Waelde"}],"duration":"PT1H23M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Far from the Madding Crowd
Z dala od zgiełku
Far from the Madding Crowd
programme.desc:
Far from the Madding Crowd: Directed by Thomas Vinterberg. With Carey Mulligan, Matthias Schoenaerts, Tilly Vosburgh, Mark Wingett. In Victorian England, the independent and headstrong Bathsheba Everdene attracts three very different suitors: Gabriel Oak, a sheep farmer; Frank Troy, a reckless Sergeant; and William Boldwood, a prosperous and mature bachelor." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2935476/","name":"Far from the Madding Crowd","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzI4NzUwNDgwN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTI3MjMwNTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"In Victorian England, the independent and headstrong Bathsheba Everdene attracts three very different suitors: Gabriel Oak, a sheep farmer; Frank Troy, a reckless Sergeant; and William Boldwood, a prosperous and mature bachelor.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2935476/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"KateC49"},"dateCreated":"2015-07-01","inLanguage":"English","name":"Exquisitley filmed but lacks the energy of the first (1967) film","reviewBody":"This has always been one of my favourite books & films and I was keen to see what they did with this a second time around. But what I want to say after seeing it was 1/see the first film 2/read the book. One of the most essential points to film was left out altogether in that when Bathsheba sent her 'joke' valentine to Boldwood she wrote the words 'Marry Me' on it. It wasn't the roses-are-red etc that got Boldwood in a twist it was the two words she wrote on the card. We get no sense of the quandary and deliberating over this that went on within Boldwood for some time before he made his move (and his ultimate obsession) in this film as we do in the first.

I think the scene when Fanny got the wrong church was disappointing as well. There was no sense of the mad dash she had across town to find the right church and only to find Frank striding out full of indignation at being stood up and telling her "It's too late!" The beautiful words of Gabriel to Bathsheba "when I look up there ye will be and when you look up there I will be" just don't feature at all.

The "shooting at the end was tame to say the least & Martin Sheen was much less forceful in his insistence of marrying Bathsheba But I did like Carey Mulligan as Bathdheba. What was missing was the energy & drama the original film had and dare I say it some Wessex accents....","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":47755,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.1},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2015-05-01","keywords":"farm,sheep,three men in love with the same woman,based on novel,playing","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2575019545","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjIyNTMzMjA4NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNzMyNzE1NDE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjIyNTMzMjA4NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNzMyNzE1NDE@._V1_.jpg","description":"In Victorian England, the independent and headstrong Bathsheba Everdene attracts three very different suitors: Gabriel Oak, a sheep farmer; Frank Troy, a reckless Sergeant; and William Boldwood, a prosperous and mature bachelor.
"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1659547/","name":"Carey Mulligan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0774386/","name":"Matthias Schoenaerts"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0790688/","name":"Michael Sheen"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0899121/","name":"Thomas Vinterberg"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0028932/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0103694/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0420822/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0362762/","name":"Thomas Hardy"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0390141/","name":"David Nicholls"}],"duration":"PT1H59M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Denmark
Dania
Denmark
programme.desc:
Denmark: Directed by Adrian Shergold. With Rafe Spall, Darren Evans, Elis James, Joel Fry. A down-on-his-luck Welshman travels across Europe with one crazy goal: to get himself arrested and sent to a Danish prison where the beds are warm and the water is hot." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt7037712/","name":"Denmark","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjI1ZTI5ODgtYjgwZC00MzY5LWIzNWQtNTE5NWY0MGVmMjA4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzQ5MzY0NjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"A down-on-his-luck Welshman travels across Europe with one crazy goal: to get himself arrested and sent to a Danish prison where the beds are warm and the water is hot.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7037712/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"fallyhag"},"dateCreated":"2020-07-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"A rather fortunate story with a realistic feel","reviewBody":"The lead is Unquestionably an excellent actor. The film felt realistic. Moody, downbeat and desperate. I could feel his stress. I felt for the character. Even if I didn't really get to know him too well.

I could understand the move to Denmark but the journey there was very fortunate. It relied on sparse filming and vague story telling. You have to just accept he went from UK to Denmark in the blink of an eye and with a lot of luck.

The love interest was also another very fortunate bit of story telling. It really did start to stretch reality a little. The speed of him being alone to having dinner was a challenge. No real attempt to create a loving romance.

But this disbelief would be dwarfed by the gun And police station scenes. It was like they run out of time and tossed a coin for the ending. Super rushed and super convenient. The ending very anti-climatic, yet Subtle and A little understated.

This is not a comedy. It is a young man at the end. Hopeless. Finding a reason not to give up. The acting was good so it was easy to travel the story. I wanted more from it but what I got was okay. The lead actor is appearing in a lot of productions just lately and this film explains why. I believed his character story so that is a credit to him. I do recommend it but save it for a chilled afternoon. #WearaMask","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1329,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2},"genre":["Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2020-07-20","keywords":"one word title,country in title,dog,bus,riding a motorbike","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1417592345","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTIwODJlNWEtYjRlZC00MWQ1LWFlMjQtNDhlNjhjODk5NDU3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTIwODJlNWEtYjRlZC00MWQ1LWFlMjQtNDhlNjhjODk5NDU3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1245863/","name":"Rafe Spall"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2362716/","name":"Darren Evans"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4629308/","name":"Elis James"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0792120/","name":"Adrian Shergold"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0103694/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0199178/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0484683/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4074534/","name":"Jeff Murphy"}],"duration":"PT1H31M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: All Square
Jesteśmy kwita
All Square
programme.desc: All Square: Directed by John Hyams. With Michael Kelly, Jesse Ray Sheps, Pamela Adlon, Isiah Whitlock Jr.. A down-on-his-luck bookie befriends an ex-girlfriend's son and begins taking bets on his youth league baseball games, creating chaos in the community." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt6927880/","name":"All Square","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTdjY2Q3NjYtMzc3Mi00ZTJkLTkzZTUtYzgxNDJiZjliNDg5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjQ2NDU3NDY@._V1_.jpg","description":"A down-on-his-luck bookie befriends an ex-girlfriend's son and begins taking bets on his youth league baseball games, creating chaos in the community.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6927880/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"akcenat"},"dateCreated":"2018-12-26","inLanguage":"English","name":"Dont be fooled with trailer, it's a drama not comedy, with rare funny parts","reviewBody":"John (Michael Kelly) is a bookie whose black-market business is being severely undercut by online gambling and the unwillingness of his clients to pay him the money they owe. So he is deciding to bet on local Little League games.\n\n"All Square" hits too many familiar beats to be memorable, also it remains low to the ground for the most part not to mention that it doesn't succeed on the humor front - probably because of the director John Hyams, who is an odd choice for this film 'cos of his previous involvement in the action genre ("Dragon Eyes", "Universal Soldier: Day of Reckoning"). With a larger budget, "All Square" could have been more of a cinematic thriller with twists and turns at every corner. Instead, it's a smaller-focused feature film that serves as a character drama study. Basically, while "All Square" is not an entirely enjoyable ride, it's all a bit too thin. 6+/7-","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":440,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.1},"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-10-12","keywords":"bookie,baseball,little league,betting,sports betting","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"All Square","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2663037465","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDI5ZDA1MzYtZjRjMi00YjViLTk0YjgtOTU3NzY5MmJkOTI2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRoaXJkLXBhcnR5LXZpZGVvLXVwZGF0ZXI@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDI5ZDA1MzYtZjRjMi00YjViLTk0YjgtOTU3NzY5MmJkOTI2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRoaXJkLXBhcnR5LXZpZGVvLXVwZGF0ZXI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Official Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0446672/","name":"Michael Kelly"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6043297/","name":"Jesse Ray Sheps"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0781899/","name":"Pamela Adlon"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0404882/","name":"John Hyams"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0643102/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0667441/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm9004197/","name":"Timothy Brady"}],"duration":"PT1H33M"}</script><metacontent="

The action scenes are truly laughable and I am sure of more than one occasion, the director of the film had the Irish flag the wrong way round. What cyclist goes to the pub on the evening of the race start lol

Even though stand the cheat that is Lance Armstrong,The Program is a far superior cycling film.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":1}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1272,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.9},"genre":["Drama","Sport"],"datePublished":"2020-09-09","keywords":"road cycling,professional athlete,cyclist,bicycle racing team,cycling accident","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2260517145","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2ZlMTU0OTQtYmJhYi00MTUxLWJjOTctZTU3YzMyY2Q1Yzg0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2ZlMTU0OTQtYmJhYi00MTUxLWJjOTctZTU3YzMyY2Q1Yzg0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Seasoned 'Super-domestique', Dom Chabol, experiences the most dramatic three days of his life as he faces the end of his time with his team, the end of his career, and even the end of his life, at the opening Irish stages of the notorious 1998 Tour de France, known as the 'Tour Du Dopage'. programme.title: Days of Heaven
Niebiańskie dni
Days of Heaven
programme.desc: Days of Heaven: Directed by Terrence Malick. With Richard Gere, Brooke Adams, Sam Shepard, Linda Manz. A hot-tempered farm laborer convinces the woman he loves to marry their rich but dying boss so that they can have a claim to his fortune." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0077405/","name":"Days of Heaven","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjMyZmU4OGYtNjBiYS00YTIxLWJjMDUtZjczZmQwMTM4YjQxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTI4MjkwNjA@._V1_.jpg","description":"A hot-tempered farm laborer convinces the woman he loves to marry their rich but dying boss so that they can have a claim to his fortune.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0077405/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"katsat"},"dateCreated":"2002-03-27","inLanguage":"English","name":"One of the most haunting and beautiful films ever made","reviewBody":"If any movie could be called filmed poetry, this would be it. From its first opening shot to its last frame, there is such lyricism and emotion and beauty that it almost leaves you speechless. I have not seen this movie in years, but it still affects me and I want to write about it. There is a pervading sadness to the movie, like a memory of something wonderful that could have been, that should have been, that almost was, and is all the more tragic because it was in your hands but slipped through your fingers. This is not a movie for everyone, but if you believe that film can be one of the highest forms of art, this is the film to see.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":55962,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"1978-10-06","keywords":"farm,train,wealth,farm worker,seasonal work","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi320650777","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzJiMmI5OWYtMzFiNC00NjYyLWJhNzctOWViM2VmOTM2YWE4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzJiMmI5OWYtMzFiNC00NjYyLWJhNzctOWViM2VmOTM2YWE4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000152/","name":"Richard Gere"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000724/","name":"Brooke Adams"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001731/","name":"Sam Shepard"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000517/","name":"Terrence Malick"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0023400/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000517/","name":"Terrence Malick"}],"duration":"PT1H34M"}</script><metacontent="

A hot-tempered farm laborer convinces the woman he loves to marry their rich but dying boss so that they can have a claim to his fortune." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0077405/","name":"Days of Heaven","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjMyZmU4OGYtNjBiYS00YTIxLWJjMDUtZjczZmQwMTM4YjQxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTI4MjkwNjA@._V1_.jpg","description":"A hot-tempered farm laborer convinces the woman he loves to marry their rich but dying boss so that they can have a claim to his fortune.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0077405/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"katsat","dateCreated":"2002-03-27","inLanguage":"English","name":"One of the most haunting and beautiful films ever made","reviewBody":"If any movie could be called filmed poetry, this would be it. From its first opening shot to its last frame, there is such lyricism and emotion and beauty that it almost leaves you speechless. I have not seen this movie in years, but it still affects me and I want to write about it. There is a pervading sadness to the movie, like a memory of something wonderful that could have been, that should have been, that almost was, and is all the more tragic because it was in your hands but slipped through your fingers. This is not a movie for everyone, but if you believe that film can be one of the highest forms of art, this is the film to see.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":55962,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8,"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"1978-10-06","keywords":"farm,train,wealth,farm worker,seasonal work","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi320650777","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzJiMmI5OWYtMzFiNC00NjYyLWJhNzctOWViM2VmOTM2YWE4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzJiMmI5OWYtMzFiNC00NjYyLWJhNzctOWViM2VmOTM2YWE4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000152/","name":"Richard Gere","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000724/","name":"Brooke Adams","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001731/","name":"Sam Shepard"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000517/","name":"Terrence Malick"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0023400/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000517/","name":"Terrence Malick"],"duration":"PT1H34M"</script><metacontent=" --- Director: Terrence Malick

programme.title: Denmark
Dania
Denmark
programme.desc:
Denmark: Directed by Adrian Shergold. With Rafe Spall, Darren Evans, Elis James, Joel Fry. A down-on-his-luck Welshman travels across Europe with one crazy goal: to get himself arrested and sent to a Danish prison where the beds are warm and the water is hot." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt7037712/","name":"Denmark","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjI1ZTI5ODgtYjgwZC00MzY5LWIzNWQtNTE5NWY0MGVmMjA4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzQ5MzY0NjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"A down-on-his-luck Welshman travels across Europe with one crazy goal: to get himself arrested and sent to a Danish prison where the beds are warm and the water is hot.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7037712/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"fallyhag"},"dateCreated":"2020-07-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"A rather fortunate story with a realistic feel","reviewBody":"The lead is Unquestionably an excellent actor. The film felt realistic. Moody, downbeat and desperate. I could feel his stress. I felt for the character. Even if I didn't really get to know him too well.

I could understand the move to Denmark but the journey there was very fortunate. It relied on sparse filming and vague story telling. You have to just accept he went from UK to Denmark in the blink of an eye and with a lot of luck.

The love interest was also another very fortunate bit of story telling. It really did start to stretch reality a little. The speed of him being alone to having dinner was a challenge. No real attempt to create a loving romance.

But this disbelief would be dwarfed by the gun And police station scenes. It was like they run out of time and tossed a coin for the ending. Super rushed and super convenient. The ending very anti-climatic, yet Subtle and A little understated.

This is not a comedy. It is a young man at the end. Hopeless. Finding a reason not to give up. The acting was good so it was easy to travel the story. I wanted more from it but what I got was okay. The lead actor is appearing in a lot of productions just lately and this film explains why. I believed his character story so that is a credit to him. I do recommend it but save it for a chilled afternoon. #WearaMask","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1329,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2},"genre":["Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2020-07-20","keywords":"one word title,country in title,dog,bus,riding a motorbike","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1417592345","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTIwODJlNWEtYjRlZC00MWQ1LWFlMjQtNDhlNjhjODk5NDU3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTIwODJlNWEtYjRlZC00MWQ1LWFlMjQtNDhlNjhjODk5NDU3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1245863/","name":"Rafe Spall"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2362716/","name":"Darren Evans"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4629308/","name":"Elis James"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0792120/","name":"Adrian Shergold"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0103694/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0199178/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0484683/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4074534/","name":"Jeff Murphy"}],"duration":"PT1H31M"}</script><metacontent="

For AR, Happy belated birthday!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":20426,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Drama","Fantasy","Romance"],"datePublished":"2018-02-23","keywords":"singing in a car,mother daughter relationship,father daughter relationship,sister sister relationship,boyfriend girlfriend conflict","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1251457049","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDI5ZmQwZGItZmEwYy00ZThiLWJjOTgtM2MyZWM1NjEzMTc3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDI5ZmQwZGItZmEwYy00ZThiLWJjOTgtM2MyZWM1NjEzMTc3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"16-year-old Rhiannon falls in love with a mysterious spirit named "A" who inhabits a different body every day. programme.title: Die Goldfische
Kłamstwo doskonałe
The Good Liar
programme.desc: Die Goldfische: Directed by Alireza Golafshan. With Tom Schilling, Klaas Heufer-Umlauf, Lisa Bitter, Sabrina Dietel. A good natured comedy about tax evasion and disability." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt7689310/","name":"Die Goldfische","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTg2YTMyYjMtMTQ3Mi00OTU4LTlmMDEtYzQ2YjVjNWYxZDA1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMDU5MDEyMA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A good natured comedy about tax evasion and disability.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7689310/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"kosmasp"},"dateCreated":"2021-05-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"Pricey fish","reviewBody":"Certain things may be hard for us as viewers to connect to. Not being a banker or someone who is detached from human interaction in general, it is not easy to fully identify with the main character here. And there are flaws or at least weird decisions along the way ... but it is a comedy and it tries to be as funny as it can be overall.\n\nThat out of the way, I had no idea what the movie would be like or any story element, so color me shocked and surprised by the inciting incident at the start of the movie. I did not see that coming/happening. After that "bang" the movie takes a minute to breathe a little bit and that is the moment you see the human in our main character. Overall we get quite a few of cliches though, but still it does its best to stay on the right side of funny and delicate when it touches certain subjects. Funny but predictable - still entertaining if you let it.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1680,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6},"genre":["Comedy"],"datePublished":"2019-03-21","keywords":"disability,wilhelm scream","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Die Goldfische","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3829447705","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDZiZjViMDctZWE0Mi00NDdlLThjYzQtN2Q3YWQ0NjEyMmE0XkEyXkFqcGdeQTNwaW5nZXN0._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDZiZjViMDctZWE0Mi00NDdlLThjYzQtN2Q3YWQ0NjEyMmE0XkEyXkFqcGdeQTNwaW5nZXN0._V1_.jpg","description":"Official Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0771713/","name":"Tom Schilling"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1678891/","name":"Klaas Heufer-Umlauf"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3474804/","name":"Lisa Bitter"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2285783/","name":"Alireza Golafshan"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0027692/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0239725/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008261/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2285783/","name":"Alireza Golafshan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1487045/","name":"Justyna Müsch"}],"duration":"PT1H51M"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 7689310, Title: Die Goldfische, --- Description: Die Goldfische: Directed by Alireza Golafshan. With Tom Schilling, Klaas Heufer-Umlauf, Lisa Bitter, Sabrina Dietel. A good natured comedy about tax evasion and disability." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt7689310/","name":"Die Goldfische","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTg2YTMyYjMtMTQ3Mi00OTU4LTlmMDEtYzQ2YjVjNWYxZDA1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMDU5MDEyMA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A good natured comedy about tax evasion and disability.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7689310/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"kosmasp","dateCreated":"2021-05-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"Pricey fish","reviewBody":"Certain things may be hard for us as viewers to connect to. Not being a banker or someone who is detached from human interaction in general, it is not easy to fully identify with the main character here. And there are flaws or at least weird decisions along the way ... but it is a comedy and it tries to be as funny as it can be overall.\n\nThat out of the way, I had no idea what the movie would be like or any story element, so color me shocked and surprised by the inciting incident at the start of the movie. I did not see that coming/happening. After that "bang" the movie takes a minute to breathe a little bit and that is the moment you see the human in our main character. Overall we get quite a few of cliches though, but still it does its best to stay on the right side of funny and delicate when it touches certain subjects. programme.title: Fatman
Przypływ
Marea alta
programme.desc:
Fatman: Directed by Eshom Nelms, Ian Nelms. With Mel Gibson, Walton Goggins, Marianne Jean-Baptiste, Chance Hurstfield. A rowdy, unorthodox Santa Claus is fighting to save his declining business. Meanwhile, Billy, a neglected and precocious 12 year old, hires a hit man to kill Santa after receiving a lump of coal in his stocking." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt10310140/","name":"Fatman","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjk1NDc4OTEtY2M3OS00M2E3LTk4YTgtYjczMzI1OWQ1ODVlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzA0OTM3NQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A rowdy, unorthodox Santa Claus is fighting to save his declining business. Meanwhile, Billy, a neglected and precocious 12 year old, hires a hit man to kill Santa after receiving a lump of coal in his stocking.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt10310140/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Go_For_The_Jugular"},"dateCreated":"2020-11-20","inLanguage":"English","name":"Interesting premise, with surprisingly good results.","reviewBody":"If you read the plot on paper, it sounds wacky and pointless. Kid hires hitman to kill Santa, for giving him coal for Christmas. But kudos to the filmmakers, because somehow they made it work!

It's probably mainly down to the main cast...Gibson, Goggins and Baptiste...all 3 were excellent...and I mean EXCELLENT! The filmmakers even make Gibson and Baptiste convincing as a couple, (if you know, you know).

Walton Goggins is brilliant in everything I've seen him in, so he's a given.

programme.title: Blinded by the Light
Blinded by the Light. Siła muzyki
Blinded by the Light
programme.desc:
Blinded by the Light: Directed by Gurinder Chadha. With Billy Barratt, Ronak Singh Chadha Berges, Viveik Kalra, Lee Barnett. In England in 1987, a teenager from an Asian family learns to live his life, understand his family and find his own voice through the music of American rock star Bruce Springsteen." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt8266310/","name":"Blinded by the Light","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDUzNGYxZDAtZjVjZC00YzI2LTk3MTItNmE3NGQwOWQwZjJiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjcyMzI2OTQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"In England in 1987, a teenager from an Asian family learns to live his life, understand his family and find his own voice through the music of American rock star Bruce Springsteen.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt8266310/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"martimusross"},"dateCreated":"2019-07-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"Great Movie With 80's Hair and Flares","reviewBody":"Blinded By The Light

I enjoyed this movie very much once I got beyond being dragged back to the 80's with the dodgy hair and flares.

The movie explored many themes and these provided the backdrop for a rites of passage of a young Pakistani man growing up in Luton. He needed to make sense of the world and this was through the cipher of Bruce Springsteen's lyrics and music.

What was good,

1, whilst dealing with racism it was presented as a feature of the time, it did not take over the movie.

2, the story was more important than realism and we had moments when the movie took off with musical numbers.

3, the whole cast did a brilliant job particularly the mum and the dad,

4, Javed play by Viveik Kalra was a masterclass in micro-emotions, the whole movie rested on this young man and he delivered the goods. Skills way beyond his years.

5, the music and graphic were great I just wish I was more familiar with the Boss's music but we were listening to Kate Bush and Duran Duran.

6, Margaret Thatcher brought a decade of pain to Britain as she transformed a bankrupt state to a market economy. It was necessary but had terrible effects on people's lives and this was shown effectively here.

This was a very niche movie, very claustrophobic and there was very little action but I enjoyed it immensely.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":23396,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.9},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Drama","Music"],"datePublished":"2019-08-09","keywords":"aspiring writer,1980s,title based on song,teenager,semi autobiographical","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2113518617","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOThkMThiNTYtNjI0MC00YWFkLTg1YjQtNjVkYzg2MWZhODJlXkEyXkFqcGdeQWpnYW1i._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOThkMThiNTYtNjI0MC00YWFkLTg1YjQtNjVkYzg2MWZhODJlXkEyXkFqcGdeQWpnYW1i._V1_.jpg","description":"From writer/director/producer Gurinder Chadha ('Bend It Like Beckham') comes the inspirational drama 'Blinded by the Light,' set to the music and lyrics of Bruce Springsteen’s timeless songs."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm7811397/","name":"Billy Barratt"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm9161436/","name":"Ronak Singh Chadha Berges"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm9196203/","name":"Viveik Kalra"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0149446/","name":"Gurinder Chadha"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046718/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0390775/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0209925/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1876954/","name":"Sarfraz Manzoor"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0149446/","name":"Gurinder Chadha"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0074488/","name":"Paul Mayeda Berges"}],"duration":"PT1H58M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Fellwechselzeit
Pora wylinki
Fellwechselzeit
programme.desc: Fellwechselzeit: Directed by Sabrina Mertens. With Zelda Espenschied, Miriam Schiweck, Freya Kreutzkam, Bernd Wolf. The still life of a family in 57 pictures. Germany in the 1970ies. Stephanie is an intelligent and lively child. But she leads an isolated life with her parents, marked by the symbiotic bonding with her mentally unstable mother. A mother who has never really left her own childhood behind and who lives amidst things of the past and the memories connected to them. Stephanie's relationship with her father is one of mistrust. The passing years only bring aging, but no future. Unspoken thoughts lurk underneath the surface of everyday life. So Stephanie retreats into a dark world of barbaric fantasies, that are nourished by the traces of the past and only belong to her alone. One day, however, Stephanie's secret invades the family's reality." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt11758900/","name":"Fellwechselzeit","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOGFkZGQ2ODctZjViOS00Yjc0LThjZjctZjg1YzliNTRlMDVlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODU2NjIzMjc@._V1_.jpg","description":"The still life of a family in 57 pictures. programme.title: Blinded by the Light
Blinded by the Light. Siła muzyki
Blinded by the Light
programme.desc:
Blinded by the Light: Directed by Gurinder Chadha. With Billy Barratt, Ronak Singh Chadha Berges, Viveik Kalra, Lee Barnett. In England in 1987, a teenager from an Asian family learns to live his life, understand his family and find his own voice through the music of American rock star Bruce Springsteen." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt8266310/","name":"Blinded by the Light","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDUzNGYxZDAtZjVjZC00YzI2LTk3MTItNmE3NGQwOWQwZjJiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjcyMzI2OTQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"In England in 1987, a teenager from an Asian family learns to live his life, understand his family and find his own voice through the music of American rock star Bruce Springsteen.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt8266310/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"martimusross"},"dateCreated":"2019-07-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"Great Movie With 80's Hair and Flares","reviewBody":"Blinded By The Light

I enjoyed this movie very much once I got beyond being dragged back to the 80's with the dodgy hair and flares.

The movie explored many themes and these provided the backdrop for a rites of passage of a young Pakistani man growing up in Luton. He needed to make sense of the world and this was through the cipher of Bruce Springsteen's lyrics and music.

What was good,

1, whilst dealing with racism it was presented as a feature of the time, it did not take over the movie.

2, the story was more important than realism and we had moments when the movie took off with musical numbers.

3, the whole cast did a brilliant job particularly the mum and the dad,

4, Javed play by Viveik Kalra was a masterclass in micro-emotions, the whole movie rested on this young man and he delivered the goods. Skills way beyond his years.

5, the music and graphic were great I just wish I was more familiar with the Boss's music but we were listening to Kate Bush and Duran Duran.

6, Margaret Thatcher brought a decade of pain to Britain as she transformed a bankrupt state to a market economy. It was necessary but had terrible effects on people's lives and this was shown effectively here.

This was a very niche movie, very claustrophobic and there was very little action but I enjoyed it immensely.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":23396,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.9},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Drama","Music"],"datePublished":"2019-08-09","keywords":"aspiring writer,1980s,title based on song,teenager,semi autobiographical","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2113518617","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOThkMThiNTYtNjI0MC00YWFkLTg1YjQtNjVkYzg2MWZhODJlXkEyXkFqcGdeQWpnYW1i._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOThkMThiNTYtNjI0MC00YWFkLTg1YjQtNjVkYzg2MWZhODJlXkEyXkFqcGdeQWpnYW1i._V1_.jpg","description":"From writer/director/producer Gurinder Chadha ('Bend It Like Beckham') comes the inspirational drama 'Blinded by the Light,' set to the music and lyrics of Bruce Springsteen’s timeless songs."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm7811397/","name":"Billy Barratt"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm9161436/","name":"Ronak Singh Chadha Berges"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm9196203/","name":"Viveik Kalra"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0149446/","name":"Gurinder Chadha"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046718/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0390775/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0209925/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1876954/","name":"Sarfraz Manzoor"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0149446/","name":"Gurinder Chadha"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0074488/","name":"Paul Mayeda Berges"}],"duration":"PT1H58M"}</script><metacontent="

I enjoyed this movie very much once I got beyond being dragged back to the 80's with the dodgy hair and flares.

The movie explored many themes and these provided the backdrop for a rites of passage of a young Pakistani man growing up in Luton. He needed to make sense of the world and this was through the cipher of Bruce Springsteen's lyrics and music.

What was good,

1, whilst dealing with racism it was presented as a feature of the time, it did not take over the movie.

2, the story was more important than realism and we had moments when the movie took off with musical numbers.

3, the whole cast did a brilliant job particularly the mum and the dad,

4, Javed play by Viveik Kalra was a masterclass in micro-emotions, the whole movie rested on this young man and he delivered the goods. Skills way beyond his years.

5, the music and graphic were great I just wish I was more familiar with the Boss's music but we were listening to Kate Bush and Duran Duran.

6, Margaret Thatcher brought a decade of pain to Britain as she transformed a bankrupt state to a market economy. It was necessary but had terrible effects on people's lives and this was shown effectively here.

This was a very niche movie, very claustrophobic and there was very little action but I enjoyed it immensely.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":23396,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.9,"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Drama","Music"],"datePublished":"2019-08-09","keywords":"aspiring writer,1980s,title based on song,teenager,semi autobiographical","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2113518617","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOThkMThiNTYtNjI0MC00YWFkLTg1YjQtNjVkYzg2MWZhODJlXkEyXkFqcGdeQWpnYW1i._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOThkMThiNTYtNjI0MC00YWFkLTg1YjQtNjVkYzg2MWZhODJlXkEyXkFqcGdeQWpnYW1i._V1_.jpg","description":"From writer/director/producer Gurinder Chadha ('Bend It Like Beckham') comes the inspirational drama 'Blinded by the Light,' set to the music and lyrics of Bruce Springsteen’s timeless songs.","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm7811397/","name":"Billy Barratt","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm9161436/","name":"Ronak Singh Chadha Berges","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm9196203/","name":"Viveik Kalra"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0149446/","name":"Gurinder Chadha"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046718/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0390775/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0209925/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1876954/","name":"Sarfraz Manzoor","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0149446/","name":"Gurinder Chadha","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0074488/","name":"Paul Mayeda Berges"],"duration":"PT1H58M"</script><metacontent=" --- Director: Gurinder Chadha

programme.title: Kingpin
Kręglogłowi
Kingpin
programme.desc:
Kingpin: Directed by Bobby Farrelly, Peter Farrelly. With Woody Harrelson, Randy Quaid, Vanessa Angel, Bill Murray. A star bowler whose career was prematurely "cut off" hopes to ride a new prodigy to success and riches." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0116778/","name":"Kingpin","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODAzODIyMDYwMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTUyNTEzNA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A star bowler whose career was prematurely "cut off" hopes to ride a new prodigy to success and riches.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0116778/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"alexkolokotronis"},"dateCreated":"2009-02-03","inLanguage":"English","name":"I Almost Died Of Laughter","reviewBody":"This of course is not a great movie but I just have to give it a 10/10. I have never laughed more in my life. Even the jokes that aren't funny are funny. This film's comedic build up is about the best you will ever see. It doesn't even matter what the punch line is, its how they get to it thats hilarious.

Now this cast was perfect. Anytime you have Randy Quaid in a film you just know the film is going to make you life just by looking at him. Kingpin couldn't have shown this any better as he plays an Amish man who just happens to be amazingly talented at bowling. Woody Harrelson plays a has-been ex-professional bowler who makes a comeback with managing through Randy Quaid. Together they go on a ride across the country making money left and right. Along the journey they are great supporting comedic performances given by Bill Murray and Vanessa Angel who certainly makes the look of the film more appealing.

The Farrelly brothers in my opinion give their best direction they've yet to have. Yet it is the writers who so perfectly set up one joke after another. It seems as if the script is so sharp that their are jokes within jokes. The Farrelly brother handle this material so well by virtual unknowns.

As I have said before this is not a great film but I would highly recommend this if your in the mood of watching something spontaneous. It may not be the most technically sound movie ever made or the deepest but I have never laughed so much in life and that in it self is what comedies are about.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":81216,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.9},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Sport"],"datePublished":"1996-07-26","keywords":"bowling,amish,on the road,big breasts,breasts","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi973258265","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjIwYWEzNGItNDJjNy00MDIwLWEyODEtMmVkNGY1ZDE0YTYwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjIwYWEzNGItNDJjNy00MDIwLWEyODEtMmVkNGY1ZDE0YTYwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A star bowler whose career was prematurely "cut off" hopes to ride a new prodigy to success and riches."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000437/","name":"Woody Harrelson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001642/","name":"Randy Quaid"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000195/","name":"Bill Murray"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0125803/","name":"Bobby Farrelly"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0268380/","name":"Peter Farrelly"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0030480/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0071430/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0266673/","name":"Barry Fanaro"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0622240/","name":"Mort Nathan"}],"duration":"PT1H54M"}</script><metacontent="
