There were brighter colors, a lighter mood, a more fun throwback general feel about it. The previous one was too dark and intense, and took itself too seriously, to its own detriment. With this one, we had our beloved Turtles back to the unpretentious way we knew them in our youth. Serious critics may be hard on this one, but I really enjoyed 112 minutes with it, right up to the classic TV cartoon theme song over the closing credits.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":88858,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6,"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Animation","Action","Adventure"],"datePublished":"2016-06-29","keywords":"sequel,turtle,based on cartoon,rat,brother brother relationship","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer #3","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2458694681","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjI5NTE2NjcwMl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTQ1NDA4ODE@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjI5NTE2NjcwMl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTQ1NDA4ODE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Meet the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles as they return to save the city from a dangerous threat.","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1083271/","name":"Megan Fox","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004715/","name":"Will Arnett","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1347153/","name":"Tyler Perry"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1757777/","name":"Dave Green"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0015592/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0023400/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0004265/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0032227/","name":"Josh Appelbaum","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0625858/","name":"André Nemec","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0481990/","name":"Peter Laird"],"duration":"PT1H52M"</script><metacontent=" --- Director: Dave Green

programme.title: The Usual Suspects
Podejrzani
The Usual Suspects
programme.desc:
The Usual Suspects: Directed by Bryan Singer. With Stephen Baldwin, Gabriel Byrne, Benicio Del Toro, Kevin Pollak. A sole survivor tells of the twisty events leading up to a horrific gun battle on a boat, which began when five criminals met at a seemingly random police lineup." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0114814/","name":"The Usual Suspects","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTViNjMyNmUtNDFkNC00ZDRlLThmMDUtZDU2YWE4NGI2ZjVmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjU0OTQ0OTY@._V1_.jpg","description":"A sole survivor tells of the twisty events leading up to a horrific gun battle on a boat, which began when five criminals met at a seemingly random police lineup.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0114814/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"illbebackreviews"},"dateCreated":"2013-02-27","inLanguage":"English","name":"At first, wasn't the biggest fan but.....","reviewBody":"I couldn't help but set rather high expectations for 'The Usual Suspects' as I went into watching this. I knew this was no action movie or any of the crap we get nowadays. This was true cinema! I was excited 'The Usual Suspects' is a mystery film about what cargo was on board the ship when it was destroyed and the events leading up to it as we are told from the only known survivor of that accident.

Around 45-50 minutes into the movie, I was starting to find myself a bit tired and thought the movie may perhaps have dragged along just a bit. I was becoming rather disappointed. Then the film truly began to change in such a way that I find it rather hard to explain. The characters began to get a little more entertaining, the pacing certainly began to pick up, the dialogue was getting more interesting and overall, I was more excited.

Then comes the amazing final twenty minutes with the plot twist and the story finally closing in perfectly, making the story more understandable. However, the final 5 minutes of the movie are some of the best moments of movie ever made and that is the ultimate plot twist which surprised the hell out of me! It was a cheering end to what ended as a great movie and a movie I would be more than happy to check out again and again! A-","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1035960,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.5},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"1995-08-16","keywords":"surprise ending,criminal mastermind,criminal,suspect,unreliable narrator","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Usual Suspects","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2717188377","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmI2NTk3ODQtYWFiNC00NDgxLTkxY2UtYTNhNTI3YTNkNzdmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmI2NTk3ODQtYWFiNC00NDgxLTkxY2UtYTNhNTI3YTNkNzdmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Gramercy Pictures"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000228/","name":"Kevin Spacey"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000321/","name":"Gabriel Byrne"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001590/","name":"Chazz Palminteri"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001741/","name":"Bryan Singer"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0106129/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0033402/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0082030/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0003160/","name":"Christopher McQuarrie"}],"duration":"PT1H46M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: G.I. Joe: The Rise of Cobra
G.I. Joe: Czas Kobry
G.I. Joe: The Rise of Cobra
programme.desc:
G.I. Joe: The Rise of Cobra: Directed by Stephen Sommers. With Adewale Akinnuoye-Agbaje, Christopher Eccleston, Grégory Fitoussi, Joseph Gordon-Levitt. An elite military unit comprised of special operatives known as G.I. Joe, operating out of The Pit, takes on an evil organization led by a notorious arms dealer." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1046173/","name":"G.I. Joe: The Rise of Cobra","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQzMTU1NzQwNl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNDg4NzMzMw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"An elite military unit comprised of special operatives known as G.I. Joe, operating out of The Pit, takes on an evil organization led by a notorious arms dealer.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1046173/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ichabod81"},"dateCreated":"2009-08-29","inLanguage":"English","name":"Delivers exactly what it promises and that's the point.","reviewBody":"Please, take note that I rated this film 8 only because of it's value as an action film, but that's exactly the point I came here to get across. Everybody seems to have the same argument when they trash this film.. "it's all effects and no brains or dramatic undertones". OK, that is true, I've got to admit, but then again what kind of movie were these people actually expecting to see? Huh?! 

G.I. Joe is as pure as an action film can possibly be and most importantly, it doesn't pretend to be anything else. Look at the poster. Check out the trailer. After those, were you perhaps waiting to see an Ingmar Bergman film? IT'S G.I. JOE, for Christ's sake! And I must say that in it's category, it isn't that bad. Sommers can direct good action sequences (the pursuit on the streets of Paris is stunning!) and although the film is obviously overblown with ridiculous gadgets and over the top plot lines, it doesn't matter because Joe succeeds in it's ONLY primary mission: to be entertaining. It's never boring and it's the silly fun it was always going to be.

So in a nutshell.. if you want a serious film to watch, check out There Will Be Blood or Doubt, but if you just want to forget for two hours the mess your leaders have left your nation, nay, the *world* and just have fun, check out this action film. Thank you.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":205276,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.8},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2009-09-23","keywords":"gi joe,swat team,2000s,destruction,iceberg","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"G.I. Joe"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000598/","name":"Dennis Quaid"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1475594/","name":"Channing Tatum"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005541/","name":"Marlon Wayans"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0814085/","name":"Stephen Sommers"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0023400/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0031181/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0130376/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0064181/","name":"Stuart Beattie"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0254213/","name":"David Elliot"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1749087/","name":"Paul Lovett"}],"duration":"PT1H58M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Godsend
Godsend
programme.desc:
Godsend: Directed by Nick Hamm. With Greg Kinnear, Rebecca Romijn, Robert De Niro, Cameron Bright. A couple agree to have their deceased son cloned, under the supervision of an enigmatic doctor, but bizarre things start to happen several years after his rebirth." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0335121/","name":"Godsend","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTYzNzE3MTg5Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTIxNDYwNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A couple agree to have their deceased son cloned, under the supervision of an enigmatic doctor, but bizarre things start to happen several years after his rebirth.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0335121/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Rob_Taylor"},"dateCreated":"2004-07-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Not one to see twice, even with the cloning element.","reviewBody":"I guess this film didn't really grip me. You knew from the start where the film was heading, but it seemed to take its sweet time about getting there. Perhaps that's why I found myself nodding off several times, only to be awoken by the obligatory, and repeated use of, shock tactics throughout the film.

I can't really think of anything positive to say about this film, but neither can I say anything greatly negative. It was neither good, nor bad. In fact, watching it was very much like being trapped in limbo. There was little to stimulate the audience's minds through most of the movie.

It's also irritating to see Hollywood moralising about the evils of cloning through the use of film. I'd hesitate to say it was right, but the last thing reasoned debate on the subject needs is idiot screenwriters cashing in on public fears (and fears that are generated by media misrepresentation, at that) and adding more fuel to the fire. What next, a movie about people turning into flies because they ate genetically modified food crops?

This film isn't very good and you won't be seeing it twice even if you do have the foolishness, like me, to watch it once. Lets just hope that this is one film that Hollywood decides NOT to clone in the future.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":4}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":25413,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.8},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Drama","Fantasy","Horror"],"datePublished":"2004-11-24","keywords":"bare chested boy,barefoot boy,camera shot of bare feet,birthday,boy","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Godsend","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2410283289","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDgwYzhlMzEtOTAyNy00MzQyLTlmODMtNTA1YjYzODk1MTA4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDgwYzhlMzEtOTAyNy00MzQyLTlmODMtNTA1YjYzODk1MTA4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000134/","name":"Robert De Niro"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001427/","name":"Greg Kinnear"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005381/","name":"Rebecca Romijn"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0358327/","name":"Nick Hamm"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0060306/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0024601/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005596/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0093560/","name":"Mark Bomback"}],"duration":"PT1H42M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Bug
Robak
Bug
programme.desc:
Bug: Directed by William Friedkin. With Ashley Judd, Michael Shannon, Harry Connick Jr., Lynn Collins. An unhinged war veteran holes up with a lonely woman in a spooky Oklahoma motel room. The line between reality and delusion is blurred as they discover a bug infestation." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0470705/","name":"Bug","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjIzOTUzMDkzMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMDY2MjMzMw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"An unhinged war veteran holes up with a lonely woman in a spooky Oklahoma motel room. The line between reality and delusion is blurred as they discover a bug infestation.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0470705/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Leofwine_draca"},"dateCreated":"2011-01-17","inLanguage":"English","name":"A bad dream of a film","reviewBody":"BUG is a creepy psychological horror yarn directed by William Friedkin, the man behind such '70s classics as THE EXORCIST and THE FRENCH CONNECTION. Is this film in the same league as those films of yester-year? Not by a long shot. While the premise has a great deal of promise behind it, by the end this is a huge disappointment, a film that sacrifices disturbing realism for over-the-top theatrics by the climax, which is a real shame.

Theatrics is appropriate, as in the end this turns out to be adapted from a stage play, as evinced by the single-room setting. The first half is quirky and unusual, as we watch the film wondering how it's going to turn out. It flirts with a lot of themes and genres, without ever being easily pigeon-holed into a single one. Is it a psychological study of madness? Is it a creature feature horror flick? Is it a study of domestic violence, a romance, a two-hander character piece? It's all of those, but by the end the intense script falls apart and ends up tackling over-the-top sci-fi themes and becoming somewhat laughable.

One thing that does keep you watching is the calibre of the acting, which is top dollar. Ashley Judd is a fine piece of casting as the put-upon, run-down heroine, and she lends this film a sense of gravitas that would have otherwise been missing. Michael Shannon is a scene-stealer, his quirky, paranoid war veteran one of the most charming performances I've seen in the past few years, and there's a neat extended cameo from Harry Connick Jr, too.

The film has plenty of strong moments, a few bits of nasty violence, and a rather silly climax. It all mixes together into a rather unsatisfactory brew by the end, but hey, at least it's different.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":34468,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.1},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama","Horror","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2008-03-05","keywords":"breast sucking,power of suggestion,based on play,male frontal nudity,bare breasts","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Bug (2006)","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2126250265","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOGEzZDJjZjMtMzA4OC00ZGJmLWE2ZjgtYTc2OWI4NDcxYmRkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOGEzZDJjZjMtMzA4OC00ZGJmLWE2ZjgtYTc2OWI4NDcxYmRkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Theatrical Trailer from Lionsgate"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000171/","name":"Ashley Judd"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0788335/","name":"Michael Shannon"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001065/","name":"Harry Connick Jr."}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001243/","name":"William Friedkin"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0060306/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0093132/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0312746/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0504832/","name":"Tracy Letts"}],"duration":"PT1H42M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Dracula Untold
programme.desc: Die Enterprise ist zu Besuch auf der Raumstation Deep Space Nine. Bei einem Experiment mit dem Stationsarzt Dr. Bashier erleidet Data einen Plasmaschock. Als er wieder zu sich kommt, verfügt er über sonderbare Erinnerungen in seinem Speicher. Worf erhält unterdessen von einem Yridianer eine schockierende Nachricht: Sein totgeglaubter Vater soll in einem romulanischen Lager gefangen gehalten werden.

programme.title: Fact or Faked: Auf den Spuren des Paranormalen
Fact or Faked: Auf den Spuren des Paranormalen
Warcraft: The Beginning
programme.desc: Picard (Patrick Stewart) will die Arbeit seines Mentors Professor Galen (Norman Lloyd) wieder aufnehmen. Dieser hatte Teile eines uralten Computerprogramms entdeckt, welches bestimmte Darstellungen von DNA-Programmen umfasst. Die fehlenden Teile befinden sich offenbar bei den Klingonen und den Kardassianern. Beide Rassen willigen ein, mit Picard zusammen zu arbeiten. Bei einem Treffen mit den Romulanern kommt eine gewagte Idee auf. Es scheint, als hätten alle Rassen den selben Ursprung.
